#include <stdio.h>
 
int main(void) {
	
	int t, n, v, w;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n );
		if( n & 0x1 ) {
			v = n >> 1;
			printf("%d\n", v * ( v + 1 ) );
		}
		else {
			v = ( n - 1 ) >> 1;
			w = n >> 1;
			printf("%d\n", ( v * ( v + 1 ) + w ) );
		}
	}
 
	return 0;
 
}
